com.hybris.cis.client.rest.payment

Interface PaymentClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CisClient
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PaymentClientImpl, PaymentMockClientImpl

    public interface PaymentClient
extends CisClient
    Client interface for a PaymentService.
